title: Mining Guild Mineral Exchange

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mining Guild Mineral Exchange is a store that sells mining gloves and superior mining gloves for unidentified minerals inside the Mining Guild. The shop is run by Belona. By speaking to Belona with both of these two gloves, players can pay her 60 unidentified minerals to combine them into a pair of expert mining gloves.

content:
Mining Guild Mineral Exchange
Released22 June 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationMining Guild
OwnerBelona
SpecialtyMining gloves
Location

Mining Guild Mineral Exchange is a store that sells mining gloves and superior mining gloves for unidentified minerals inside the Mining Guild. The shop is run by Belona. By speaking to Belona with both of these two gloves, players can pay her 60 unidentified minerals to combine them into a pair of expert mining gloves.

Stock[edit | edit source]

The bag full of gems and soft clay packs are unique to this shop, meaning that the versions of these items bought elsewhere cannot be resold here.

Sells at: 100.0% • Buys at: 80.0% • Change per: 0.0%
